alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; Morrison (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 9:49AM CDT until further notice by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Mississippi River at Fort Ripley affecting Morrison and Crow Wing Counties. For the Mississippi River...including Mississippi at Fort Ripley... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Fort Ripley. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, The boat landing and parking lot at the public access are under water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CDT Friday the stage was 10.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 11.8 feet early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 10.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.4 feet on 04/08/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/duluth. The next statement will be issued by 1 PM Saturday afternoon.
